item.title: Adding !@#$%^&*() to user names
item.dc:creator: @beer123 beer123
item.description:
@beer123 wrote:

pesterd:

this belongs in server and client help but there is a file where it says all the digits and number/letters that can be used for when creating an account. If you can find that file simply just add those digits into it as well and it should work. I saw the file like last week but forgot the location of it

hmm i coudent find ne thing in player.java or ne thing >.< any 1 else know where it is around?? for a key word to search for?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding !@#$%^&*() to user names
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“Jonesy1128, post:3, topic:267780”]I have no idea why you would want that.

People will just use it to make annoying as shit names, such as: Jonesy
Or Jonesy! It’s just a bad idea.[/quote]

if you didnt notice. people are crashing the servers by doing so and its a good fix for now and if ppl do make annoying name then they would just get deleted and banned…

Read full topic
